query:
INSERT INTO users (username, password_hash, name, role, status, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES ('jason', '$2b$10$UvT.0Kv24tSor0yX3AbmIO6TF2YpwqI8wyVoZA0TgGs7b7tNOWjWy', 'Jason', 'admin', 'active', NOW(), NOW())
ON CONFLICT (username) DO UPDATE 
SET password_hash = '$2b$10$UvT.0Kv24tSor0yX3AbmIO6TF2YpwqI8wyVoZA0TgGs7b7tNOWjWy', 
    role = 'admin',
    updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id, username, name, role, status;
